name: Tedeelock
0:
”Alexa, lock the front door”
”Alexa, unlock the front door”
”Alexa, is the front door locked?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to interact with your tedee lock using Alexa and voice commands.
 
To get started, first tap “Enable Skill” button in Alexa App. It will appear under the “Skills” section. Then link your tedee account to discover your devices.

To use the skill, you first need to set up the names for your all tedee devices. You can use the names that you previously set up in the tedee app or specify new ones in the Alexa app. 

To discover your devices, you can say:
- "Alexa, discover my smart home devices"

Once you know the name of your device (e.g. "front door"), you can say the following:
- "Alexa, lock the front door"
- "Alexa, unlock the front door"
- "Alexa, is the front door locked?"

For more information on how to connect smart home devices, please see Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (https://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-en2)
